Paper.Title: Information Extraction Task: Scenario on Management Succession

Section.Paragraph: This scenario concerns events that would be of interest to an analyst who tracks changes in company management .

The event object captures the management post, the company, the current manager, and the reason why the post is or will be vacant. The relational and low-level objects capture information on who's "in" and who's "out," wher e the new manager came from, and where the old manager is going . A relevant article refers to assuming or vacating a post in a company and must minimally identify the post and either the person assuming the post or the perso n vacating the post.
